csw:Record.dc:title: Black Sea Temperature and Salinity Climatology V1.1
csw:Record.dc:subject: Oceanographic geographical features
Temperature of the water column
Salinity of the water column
ITS-90 water temperature
Water body salinity
Black Sea
Sea of Azov
oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
Monthly temperature and salinity climatology done from the SeaDataNet aggregated dataset v1.1 by DIVA software v4.6.10. The period covers 1900-2013.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
csw:Record.dc:description:
Monthly temperature and salinity climatology done from the SeaDataNet aggregated dataset v1.1 by DIVA software v4.6.10. The period covers 1900-2013.
For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org
csw:Record.dc:source: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI

dc:URI.name: Black Sea/Salinity.4Danl.nc*Salinity_L2
dc:URI.description: Salinity masked using relative error threshold 0.5

dc:URI.name: Black Sea/Temperature.4Danl.nc*Temperature_L2
dc:URI.description: Temperature masked using relative error threshold 0.5

dc:URI.name: Black Sea/Temperature.4Danl.nc*Temperature_L1
dc:URI.description: Temperature masked using relative error threshold 0.3

dc:URI.name: Black Sea/Salinity.4Danl.nc*Salinity_L1
